changeSet.createView: SELECT ORG.ID, ORG.NAME, ORG.ACCOUNT_ID, ORG_WITH_CONFLICT.RECENT, ORG_WITH_CONFLICT.RECOMMENDED FROM ORGANIZATION ORG LEFT JOIN (SELECT ORG_WITH_CONFLICT.ID, C.RECENT, C.RECOMMENDED FROM ORGANIZATION ORG_WITH_CONFLICT, (SELECT RESOURCE_ID, COUNT(RESOURCE_ID) RECOMMENDED, MAX(STATE_DATE) RECENT FROM CONFLICT WHERE STATE = 'PENDING' GROUP BY RESOURCE_ID ORDER BY RESOURCE_ID) C WHERE ID = RESOURCE_ID) ORG_WITH_CONFLICT ON ORG.ID = ORG_WITH_CONFLICT.ID
